text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One day, while heading to my office...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: O-ouuuch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hear a cry of pain coming from the<n>infirmary. It's El
Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I should go take a look!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, no-no-no, not like this! I have to<n>recover and get back
to training!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
With my mask on, I'm invincible! The<n>strongest, undefeated,
bravest, and<n>most perfect Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It'll be okay. I'm strong. I'm tough!<n>So it's all good.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Okay, time to—ow-ow-ow!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whoooaaaaa?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
T-T-T-T-T-T-Trainer?! Close! Your<n>eyes! Right now! Right this
instant!<n>Now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She shouts at me so loudly that I<n>instinctively close my
eyes.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: There... we go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Okay. You can open them now,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Whew... You didn't see anything,<n>right? After all, there was
nothing to<n>see! Right?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You. Saw. Nothing. Right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Talk about scary...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Good, I'm glad to hear it! By the way,<n>what brings you here,
Trainer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, could it be that you heard my<n>voice earlier? And now
you're here to<n>check on me?
choice_data_list: Are your legs all right? Let me see.
Are your legs all right? Let me see.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ah—no, really, they're fine! All bueno!<n>Gracias for the
concern, but I'm right<n>as rain!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, you came flying in<n>here just because you
heard my cries<n>of pain?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Such passion! You're overflowing<n>with fiery passion! I
might even melt!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Seeing you get all fired up like this<n>makes me feel better
already!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Looks like the world's strongest<n>racer really does need a
trusty partner<n>in crime!
choice_data_list:
So you're really aiming to be the world's
strongest?

So you're really aiming to be the world's
strongest?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Tch, tch, tch. Trainer, I'm notaiming... I'm proving that I'mthe world's strongest!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's my promise to Papa's mask.<n>He handed it down to
me, you know.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
He told me, "This is your papa's<n>mask—the mask of the
world's<n>strongest masked wrestler! Once you<n>put it on,
you'll be the world's<n>strongest too, El!"

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
When I put the mask on, the weak<n>and cowardly crybaby El
vanished.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
In her place, El Condor Pasa—the<n>world's bravest,
speediest, and<n>strongest racer—was booorn!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I swore by this mask that one day, I<n>would make a name for
myself as the<n>world's strongest racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: O-ouch!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: D-don't worry, it's nothing!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Contrary to her words, she looks like<n>she's in pain. Those
consecutive<n>training programs must have done a<n>number
on her body...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right! Today... might not be<n>the best day, but I
wanna try your<n>training program next!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Heheh, I know what you're thinking.After all, you are the one whocame to scout me straight away.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I bet you're starting to get reeeal<n>impatient waiting for your
turn to train<n>me, right?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'll grant you that wish of yours! Next<n>time, let's meet on
the track! Chao!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: O-o-ouuuch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...I still can't match her in energy, but<n>for now, it looks like
I'm next up in El<n>Condor Pasa's training queue.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now, what kind of training program<n>does someone aiming to
be the<n>strongest in the world need? I'll need<n>to take my
time and give this some<n>thought...
